title: Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - Third Series (Hardcover)
description:
In a saloon in the town of Tull, the last gunslinger is approached by a bizarre figure that has a message for him.
The message is terrifying. What's worse, it is delivered by a dead man named Nort whose corpse was animated
to serve this very purpose. And that's only the beginning of the horrors awaiting the gunslinger in this strange
place deep within Mid-World as Roland Deschain continues his quest for the Man in Black that has become his
obsession. Collecting DARK TOWER: THE GUNSLINGER - THE BATTLE OF TULL #1-5.
